WorkItem.Description: Ret pally here. In 2.1.8 the "Darkmoon Card: Greatness" was far and away the best trinket to have. Now with 2.1.9 it's third down on the list. What happened to it? Is the +300 STR proc not being accounted for?

Comments.Message: We're now modeling the proc, but only some models support it. (It used to be just static stats) I think the Ret model doesn't support it yet. Just edit the item, and add 90 more str.
It isn't working for DK's either.
Where would you add the 90 more str?  In the STR field or the proc field?
To add to this it appears the Mirror of Truth is pretty messed up as well for DK's.
To the Strength field. DPSDK and Ret don't model the proc, so just add it as static Strength, which 90 is a decent estimation of.

TankDK has the SpecialEffects code in what I have checked out, but that is part of a series of sweeping changes that I don't have checked in yet.  I'll confirm that I see some appropriate numbers when I get back to working on it. :)
